header.title: EVERYDAY BACKPACK
header.description: An iconic, award-winning pack for everyday and photo carry, the newly revamped Everyday Backpack is built around access, organization, expansion, and protection. Unique MagLatch hardware provides lightning fast top access, with dual side access via two weatherproof UltraZips.

features.subtitle: INSTANT ACCESS
list: Fast, secure, one-handed top access via MagLatch hardware
Dual side access via #8 weatherproof zips

features.subtitle: EXPANDABLE
list: MagLatch hardware provides internal expansion. +3L on the 20L bag, +8L on the 30L bag

features.subtitle: CUSTOM ORGANIZATION
list: Brilliantly customizable and protective internal organization via 3 easy-to-configure FlexFold dividers

features.subtitle: POCKETS FOR DAYS
list: Stretchy internal side and top pockets for cards, cords, and more
Internal slip pockets for wallet, passport, and other important items
Dual external side pockets stretch to fit water bottles, tripods, etc

features.subtitle: LAPTOP SLEEVE
list: Protective laptop sleeve with pockets for tablets and documents
Adjustable for easy access to smaller laptops

features.subtitle: EXTERNAL CARRY
list: 4 external carry straps for cinching down bulky items via our Cord Hook system
Straps stow beneath a magnetic sleeve

features.subtitle: ULTIMATE COMFORT
list: Vented, quick-drying mesh back padding for breathable comfort

features.subtitle: TRAVEL-FRIENDLY
list: Luggage pass-through for easy and secure roller-top carry

features.subtitle: HIP BELT ACCESSORY
list: A padded, stowable Hip Belt accessory is available for purchase for those who want added stability and comfort with heavy loads.

features.subtitle: DURABLE & WEATHERPROOF
list: Weatherproof, 100% recycled 400D nylon canvas shell is DWR impregnated, double PU-coated.

overview: 4 Cord Hook external carry straps (2 long, 2 short—not pictured)
materials: 400D double poly-coated DWR-impregnated nylon canvas shell
Solution-dyed to save energy & water (Charcoal only)
Hardware is anodized aluminum and glass-reinforced nylon
Accents in leather (Charcoal, Ash, Midnight) or Hypalon (Black)
